fields.name: Louis Wu
fields.summary: Our first team member specializes in biology, behavioral sciences, and product design. He is a Remarkable Students Showcase Champion, won gold at the Canada-Wide Science Fair, and was chosen to represent Canada at the EU Contest for Young Scientists.

fields.name: Koral Kulacoglu
fields.summary: Koral specializes in engineering, programming, and neural networks. Alongside Louis, Koral was one of the original developers of the FourSight project.

fields.name: Ethan Zhao
fields.summary: Ethan specializes in web design and production. He manages website design, video editing, and video design.

fields.name: Alex Gan
fields.summary: Alex specializes in finance, business management, and corporate development. Alex worked for the Ontario Public Service as a Finance & Risk Assistant and is now focused on corporate development of FourSight.
